welcome: Reborn Daycare – Care and love for your reborn baby
aboutText: Your reborn baby will feel at home with us. Here, they have a structured routine full of love, attention, and stimulation — everything a baby needs to be happy.

dailyActivities.title: At our daycare, the day is filled with:
activities: Peaceful nap time with soft music
Daily photo session with outfit of the day

benefits.title: Our Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Why Choose Us?
benefits.description: We provide a safe, nurturing environment where your child can learn and grow.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Affordable rates with flexible scheduling options. Contact us for detailed pricing information.

tagline: Where Every Child's Journey Begins with Love and Care

comments.title: Share Your Experience
comments.description: We would love to hear about your experience with our daycare. Please share your thoughts and comments below.

storytime.name: Story Time
storytime.description: Interactive storytelling sessions with colorful books and puppets

musicmovement.name: Music & Movement
musicmovement.description: Fun dance and music activities to develop motor skills

artscrafts.name: Arts & Crafts
artscrafts.description: Creative activities with safe, child-friendly materials

discussion.title: Join the Discussion
discussion.description: Share your thoughts and experiences with our community

careers.title: Work with Us!
careers.subtitle: Join our magical team of doll caretakers!
careers.description: We're always looking for passionate individuals who believe in the power of play and imagination. No experience with real children required!

doll_whisperer.title: Doll Whisperer
doll_whisperer.description: Can you understand what a doll is thinking just by looking at its plastic eyes? We need someone who can interpret doll emotions and mediate doll conflicts. Must be fluent in Dollish.

hair_stylist.title: Doll Hair Stylist
hair_stylist.description: Expert in untangling synthetic hair disasters. Must be able to create 100 different hairstyles using only a comb and positive thoughts. Experience with real hair optional.

fashion_consultant.title: Doll Fashion Consultant
fashion_consultant.description: Help our dolls stay on trend! Must know the difference between a tutu and a tulle, and be able to accessorize with tiny shoes. Previous experience dressing real people not required.

doll_therapist.title: Doll Therapist
doll_therapist.description: Specialized in resolving doll identity crises. Must be able to help dolls come to terms with being mass-produced. Experience with existential philosophy a plus.

toy_archaeologist.title: Toy Archaeologist
toy_archaeologist.description: Excavate and restore vintage dolls from the depths of toy boxes. Must be able to date a doll by its hairstyle and identify authentic 80s fashion.

doll_exorcist.title: Doll Exorcist
doll_exorcist.description: Specialized in removing unwanted spirits from haunted reborn dolls. Must be able to perform exorcisms using only baby powder and lullabies. Experience with real exorcisms not required, but a good sense of humor is a must!

entity_summoner.title: Entity Summoner
entity_summoner.description: Looking for someone who can summon friendly spirits to inhabit our reborn dolls. Must be able to distinguish between playful poltergeists and problematic possessions. Experience with Ouija boards optional, but must bring their own collection of creepy dolls.
